#include <stdio.h>
int last(long unsigned int n)
{
  int arr[10]={0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9};
int s=0;
 while(n)
 {
 s=s+arr[n%10];
 n=n/10;
}
 return s%10;
}
int main()
{
	long unsigned int a,b,sum;
	int t;
	scanf("%lu",&t);
	do{
		scanf("%lu %lu",&a,&b);
		sum=0;
		while(a<b && a%10!=0)
		{
			sum+=last(a);
			a++;
		}
		while(b>a && b%10!=0)
		{
			sum+=last(b);
			b--;
		}
		sum+=45*((b-a)/10);
		sum+=last(b);
		printf("%lu\n",sum);
		t--;
	}while(t!=0);
	return 0;
}
